pageSetting.title: 存贷款业绩分配日志

select.isEqual: select zh.khh, zh.zhhm as khmc, czy.hymc as xgry,zh.zhdh, hy.hymc, gxjl.zlbl, gxjl.clbl, gxjl.clje yz, gxjl.qsrq, gxjl.jsrq, jg.jgmc jgmc, czlxms.dmms as czlx, F_TIMETOCHAR(gxrz.jlsj,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') jlsj, case when gxjl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as ggbz, gxjl.gxhslx from pas.xtb_hyzhgxrz gxrz inner join pas.xtb_hyzhgxjl gxjl on gxrz.jldh = gxjl.jldh inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = gxjl.khdxdh and sjw.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join pas.khdx_jg jg on jgcy.jgkhdxdh = jg.khdxdh and jg.zxrq >= $jsrq$ inner join pas.jxdx_$dxlxfs$zh zh on zh.jxdxdh = gxrz.jxdxdh and zh.zhdh like '%$accid$%' inner join pas.khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gxjl.khdxdh inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = gxrz.xgrdh inner join csb_dmms czlxms on lower(czlxms.dmmc)='rzczlx' and gxrz.czlx=czlxms.dmz where 1=1 and gxrz.jxdxlx=$dxlx$ and zh.zhdh like '$accid$%' and gxrz.xgrdh=$khdxdh$ and sjw.tjrq=f_timetoint(gxrz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') and f_timetoint(gxrz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ order by gxrz.jlsj desc,zh.zhdh, gxjl.jldh, gxjl.ggbz asc

select zh.khh, zh.zhhm as khmc, zh.zhdh, hy.hymc, gxjl.zlbl, gxjl.clbl, gxjl.clje yz, gxjl.qsrq, gxjl.jsrq, jg.jgmc jgmc, czlxms.dmms as czlx, F_TIMETOCHAR(gxrz.jlsj,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') jlsj, case when gxjl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as ggbz, gxjl.gxhslx from pas.xtb_hyzhgxrz gxrz inner join pas.xtb_hyzhgxjl gxjl on gxrz.jldh = gxjl.jldh inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = gxjl.khdxdh and sjw.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join pas.khdx_jg jg on jgcy.jgkhdxdh = jg.khdxdh and jg.zxrq >= $jsrq$ inner join pas.jxdx_$dxlxfs$zh zh on zh.jxdxdh = gxrz.jxdxdh and zh.zhdh like '%$accid$%' inner join pas.khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gxjl.khdxdh inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = gxrz.xgrdh inner join csb_dmms czlxms on lower(czlxms.dmmc)='rzczlx' and gxrz.czlx=czlxms.dmz where 1=1 and gxrz.jxdxlx=$dxlx$ and gxrz.xgrdh=$khdxdh$ and zh.zhdh like '$accid$%' and sjw.tjrq=f_timetoint(gxrz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') and f_timetoint(gxrz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ order by gxrz.jlsj desc,zh.zhdh, gxjl.jldh, gxjl.ggbz asc

select zh.khh, zh.zhhm as khmc,czy.hymc as xgry, zh.zhdh, hy.hymc, gxjl.zlbl, gxjl.clbl, gxjl.clje yz, gxjl.qsrq, gxjl.jsrq, jg.jgmc jgmc, czlxms.dmms as czlx, F_TIMETOCHAR(gxrz.jlsj,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') jlsj, case when gxjl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as ggbz, gxjl.gxhslx from xtb_hyzhgxrz gxrz inner join pas.xtb_hyzhgxjl gxjl on gxrz.jldh = gxjl.jldh inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = gxjl.khdxdh and sjw.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join pas.khdx_jg jg on jgcy.jgkhdxdh = jg.khdxdh and jg.zxrq >= $jsrq$ inner join jxdx_$dxlxfs$zh zh on zh.jxdxdh = gxrz.jxdxdh and zh.zhdh like '%$accid$%' inner join pas.khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = gxjl.khdxdh inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = gxrz.xgrdh inner join csb_dmms czlxms on lower(czlxms.dmmc)='rzczlx' and gxrz.czlx=czlxms.dmz where 1=1 and gxrz.jxdxlx=$dxlx$ and gxjl.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and sjw.tjrq=f_timetoint(gxrz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') and gxrz.jlsj between F_INTTOTIME($qsrq$,1) and F_INTTOTIME($jsrq$,2) order by gxrz.jlsj desc,zh.zhdh, gxjl.jldh, gxjl.ggbz asc
